pages.title: Pillager Disguise
pages.text: The pillager disguise is a unique and gruesome new armor set than can harvested from a Pillagers corpse. When wearing the full set Pillagers will no longer be aggressive to you as they see you as one of them. $(br2)Whilst wearing the set you can also press $(#f92020)$(k:butcher.pillagernosepress)$() to make Pillager noises.
